mapper.select: SELECT manage.BNDT_ID as bndtId , manage.BNDT_DE as bndtDe , manage.RM as remark , ( select user_nm from COMVNUSERMASTER where esntl_id = manage.BNDT_ID ) AS bndtTemp1, (select count(diary.BNDT_ID) from COMTNBNDTDIARY diary where diary.BNDT_ID = manage.BNDT_ID and diary.BNDT_DE = manage.BNDT_DE) AS bndtTemp2 FROM COMTNBNDTMANAGE manage WHERE 1=1 AND binary(SUBSTR(BNDT_DE, 1, 6)) like CONCAT('%', #{bndtDe}, '%') ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC

SELECT BNDT_ID as bndtId , BNDT_DE as bndtDe , RM as remark , FRST_REGISTER_ID as frstRegisterId, DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') as FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID as lastUpdusrId , DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') as lastUpdusrPnttm, mst.user_nm AS bndtTemp1, (select org.orgnzt_nm from COMTNORGNZTINFO org where org.orgnzt_ID = mst.orgnzt_ID) AS bndtTemp2 FROM COMTNBNDTMANAGE ans, COMVNUSERMASTER mst WHERE BNDT_ID = #{bndtId} AND BNDT_DE = #{bndtDe} AND ans.BNDT_ID = mst.ESNTL_ID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNBNDTMANAGE (BNDT_ID , BNDT_DE , RM , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM) VALUES (#{bndtId} , #{bndtDe}, #{remark}, #{frstRegisterId}, now() )

SELECT BNDT_CECK_SE AS bndtCeckSe , BNDT_CECK_CODE AS bndtCeckCd , BNDT_CECK_CODE_NM AS bndtCeckCdNm , USE_AT AS useAt , FRST_REGISTER_ID AS frstRegisterId , DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID AS lastUpdusrId , DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS lastUpdusrPnttm , (select code_nm from COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE where code_id ='COM071' and code = BNDT_CECK_SE) as bndtCeckTemp1 FROM COMTNBNDTCECKMANAGE WHERE 1=1
AND binary(BNDT_CECK_SE) like CONCAT('%', #{searchBndtCeckSe}, '%')

AND binary(BNDT_CECK_CODE_NM) like CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNBNDTCECKMANAGE WHERE 1=1
AND binary(BNDT_CECK_SE) like CONCAT('%', #{searchBndtCeckSe}, '%')
AND binary(BNDT_CECK_CODE) like CONCAT('%', #{searchBndtCeckCd}, '%')

SELECT BNDT_CECK_SE AS bndtCeckSe , BNDT_CECK_CODE AS bndtCeckCd , BNDT_CECK_CODE_NM AS bndtCeckCdNm , USE_AT AS useAt , FRST_REGISTER_ID AS frstRegisterId , DATE_FORMAT(FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS FRST_REGISTER_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID AS lastUpdusrId , DATE_FORMAT(LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') AS lastUpdusrPnttm , (select code_nm from COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE where code_id ='COM071' and code = BNDT_CECK_SE) as bndtCeckTemp1 FROM COMTNBNDTCECKMANAGE WHERE BNDT_CECK_SE = #{bndtCeckSe} AND BNDT_CECK_CODE = #{bndtCeckCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNBNDTCECKMANAGE (BNDT_CECK_SE , BNDT_CECK_CODE , BNDT_CECK_CODE_NM , USE_AT , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM) VALUES (#{bndtCeckSe} , #{bndtCeckCd} , #{bndtCeckCdNm} , #{useAt} , #{frstRegisterId}, now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNBNDTCECKMANAGE SET BNDT_CECK_CODE_NM = #{bndtCeckCdNm} , USE_AT = #{useAt} , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = now() WHERE BNDT_CECK_SE = #{bndtCeckSe} AND BNDT_CECK_CODE = #{bndtCeckCd}
mapper.select: Select diary.BNDT_ID AS bndtId , diary.BNDT_DE AS bndtDe , ceck.BNDT_CECK_SE AS bndtCeckSe , ceck.BNDT_CECK_CODE AS bndtCeckCd , ceck.BNDT_CECK_CODE_NM AS bndtCeckCdNm, diary.CHCK_STTUS AS chckSttus FROM COMTNBNDTCECKMANAGE ceck LEFT JOIN COMTNBNDTDIARY diary ON diary.BNDT_CECK_SE = ceck.BNDT_CECK_SE AND diary.BNDT_CECK_CODE = ceck.BNDT_CECK_CODE AND diary.BNDT_ID = #{bndtId} AND diary.BNDT_DE = #{bndtDe} WHERE USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY ceck.BNDT_CECK_SE, ceck.BNDT_CECK_CODE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNBNDTDIARY (BNDT_ID , BNDT_DE , BNDT_CECK_SE , BNDT_CECK_CODE , CHCK_STTUS , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES (#{bndtId} , #{bndtDe} , #{bndtCeckSe} , #{bndtCeckCd} , #{chckSttus} , #{frstRegisterId}, now() )
